outputs.output_descr: Proposals for policy, institutional and operational reform in the justice sector formulated and actions taken to build consensus amongs stakeholders. This builds on the UNDAF 2012-2016 outcome that is focused on deepening governance in Ghana through policy support, institutional capacity building, advocacy and the creation of platforms for dialogue.

project_descr: The project seeks to deepen the culture and practice of transparency and accountability at the local governance level while strengthening the administration of justice and the capacity of citizens to access the legal system.
